Description.Beginner: The Master mode lets you register settings that you often use in the Voice, Performance, Song or Pattern mode, and instantly recall the relevant mode and custom settings together in a single button press—without having to first select a mode. In addition, this mode lets you divide the keyboard into four separate sections—just as if you were playing four different MIDI keyboards.
Description.Advanced: You are currently in the Master mode. Register or recall settings from the different modes.

Master.Actions: Press [SONG] to go to the song screen.

Description.Beginner: The Song mode lets you record, edit and play your own original Songs.
Description.Advanced: You are currently in the Song mode. Record, edit and play your own original Songs.

Song.Actions: Press [REC] to go to the song record screen. Press [STORE] to go to the Store screen and save your program to internal memory.

Description.Beginner: The Record mode lets you adjust different song settings for your recording.
Description.Advanced: You are currently in the Record mode which lets you adjust different song settings for your recording.

Record.Actions: Press [F2] to go to the voice function

Description.Beginner: This synthesizer has a wealth of high quality, dynamic sounds—also referred to as 'Voices.'' You can play these Voices—one Voice at a time—from the keyboard in the Voice mode. This mode also lets you create your own original Voices.
Description.Advanced: You can play a variety of different sounds or create your own sounds in this mode.

Voice.Actions: Press [PLAY] to start recording. You will hear the metronome after pressing [PLAY] and your recording time will start. Afterwards, press [STOP] to end the recording.

Description.Beginner: This mode lets you store the edited program to internal memory.
Description.Advanced: Store the edited program to internal memory.

Store.Actions: Press [ENTER] to store all Songs and Patterns

Description.Beginner: Are you sure you want to save?
Description.Advanced: Are you sure you want to save?

Save confirmation.Actions: Press [EXIT] for No, Press [ENTER] for Yes.

Description.Beginner: Please keep power on. Saving in progress.
Description.Advanced: Please keep power on. Saving in progress.

Description.Beginner: You are exiting a screen in which you edited data and have not saved. Edited data will be discarded if you continue.

Exit confirmation.Actions: Press [EXIT] for No, Press [ENTER] for Yes.

Unknown.Actions: Press [MASTER] to go back to the home page.
